tagline.title: BALI SWING AND ULUWATU TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR FOR DO SWING AT BALI SWING AND THEN VISIT ULUWATU TEMPLE WITH SUNSET VIEW
tagline.text: BALI SWING AND ULUWATU TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR FOR DO SWING AT BALI SWING AND THEN VISIT ULUWATU TEMPLE WITH SUNSET VIEW
tagline.html: BALI SWING AND ULUWATU TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR FOR DO SWING AT BALI SWING AND THEN VISIT ULUWATU TEMPLE WITH SUNSET VIEW

description.text: Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour is Bali Combination Tour package that we designed for your to enjoy to different activity in one day which is do Jungle swing at Bali swing and then continue visit uluwatu temple with amazing view of sunset. This is great combination for those want to do jungle swing and visit uluwatu temple and other tourist attraction in one day. First trip is to enjoy swing at Bali Swing, try many kind activities here and take picture in different spot with beautiful background in this place. After do the swing, we will enjoy lunch Indonesian food in this place, after finish lunch we will continue the tour to visit padang - padang beach or most known as labuan sait beach, then visiting uluwatu temple is hindu temple located in the cliff and facing to Indian ocean with breathtaking view of sunset, and then continue to watch kecak and fire dance performance near the temple. after that we directly back to your hotel with bring an awesome memory feature in this combination tour of Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour, below is short description of the tour.
description.html: Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour is Bali Combination Tour package that we designed for your to enjoy to different activity in one day which is do Jungle swing at Bali swing and then continue visit uluwatu temple with amazing view of sunset. title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour | Bali Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. Enjoy the sensation of swing activity in jungle with amazing view and beautiful scenery, take picture with beautiful scenery in this place

button.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour

description.text: Located at Jalan Labuan Sait, in the village of Pecatu, Bali. Located not too far from the tourist area of ​​Uluwatu Temple and most visited by guest that want to see beach near uluwatu temple. To get to this beach, we had to descend the stairs are made in the cliffs. After a few yards down the stairs we are greeted by the sun. It turns a dark alley behind the beach there is incredible beauty. The waves that roll, rock-breaking waves, and the sky is captivating. White sandy beach stretching ahead of you, clear blue water and flat, perfect for swimming.

title.title: Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour | Uluwatu Temple

image.title: Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour | Uluwatu Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Uluwatu Temple is Hindu temple part of sea temple, located on a 70-meter-high cliff protruding above Indonesian Ocean. This temple is one of the most site most visited in Bali, in this temple you will see an amazing view of sunset and also can see some monkey roaming in the temple, they are believed the monkey is guard the temple from bad influences. The serpentine pathway to the temple is fortified by concrete walls on the cliff side. It takes about an hour to get from one end to another as there are several fenced points along the way to stop. The views from the bottom of the water surging up against rocks and the ocean horizon are remarkable.
description.html: Uluwatu Temple is Hindu temple part of sea temple, located on a 70-meter-high cliff protruding above Indonesian Ocean. The views from the bottom of the water surging up against rocks and the ocean horizon are remarkable.

title.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kecak Dance is a spectacular traditional dance with the group of people playing this dance with fire game. It is very exciting and unique dance due to the sound of gamelan is not using the normal gamelan but use their mouth. The dancers make the compact choir with the exquisite dance movement that is one of this dance features. Kecak dance performance presents the dance as an introduction to the story a fragment from the Ramayana, the Hindu epic which finds its expression in many forms. This dance theater located beside the uluwatu temple, while see the dance you can see the view of sunset from this place

price.title: Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,500,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 800,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Swing and Uluwatu Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol and Parking Fee
  • Swing at Bali Swing
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket at Tourism Site
  • Insurance Coverage during Bali Swing
  • Mineral Water

Area Covered for Pick Up :

Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

Note :

  • The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

inclusion:
• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
